sentences.en: Comments on the Philosophers is a literary special academic works on gloss and emendation.
sentences.cn: 《诸子平议》是一部训诂和校勘的笔记体学术专著,作者俞樾,晚清小学大家.

sentences.en: Frames design, capability selection of servo motors and precision emendation were the mechanical problems.
sentences.cn: 机械设计方面包括框架设计 、 电机容量选择和精度校验等.

sentences.en: Other emendation records , e . g . addition , deletion and correction, are shown in the same way.
sentences.cn: 其他校改记录如增补 、 删节及误字改正也以同样的方式显示.

sentences.en: The difficulty in the Plate Recognition is skew emendation.
sentences.cn: 车牌识别的难点在于倾斜校正和模糊识别.

sentences.en: The emendation has been accepted by teachers, but it has defects all the same.
sentences.cn: 人教版教科书的修订已经获得广大一线教师的认可, 但仍有不适和令人遗憾之处.

sentences.en: The paper introduces system structure, gamma ray testing, core location, sample depth emendation and so on.
sentences.cn: 文章介绍了系统结构及伽马测试 、 岩心归位 、 样品深度校正等.

sentences.en: This paper discussed the emendation of the luminescent spectra of semiconductor films.
sentences.cn: 讨论了半导体发光薄膜的光致发光谱修正要点.

sentences.en: We adopted open looped emendation regulate , PID regulate and self - tuning regulate in control strategy.
sentences.cn: 采用的控制策略有开关量的开环校正控制 、 单回路 PID控制等控制策略.
